item.title: Vintage Vegas Racing: Remembering the Derby Turf Club & Its Race Betting Legacy
item.description:
A Fremont Street Favorite: The Derby Turf Club’s Race Betting Past

The 1950s and 60s in Las Vegas were a time of rapid growth and exciting innovation. While the Strip was evolving into the entertainment mecca we know today, Downtown, clustered around Fremont Street, thrived with a different kind of energy - a raw, gambling-focused vibe. Among the establishments contributing to that distinct character was the Derby Turf Club, a dedicated race and sports book that left its mark on Las Vegas history.
